metadata.name: MEDITATION
metadata.description:
MEDITATION
Mindfulness of Sound around our

 Sounds surround us always. The chirping of birds, the sound of computer keys being pressed, the sounds on the streets outside, the honking of cars-there is no dearth of sounds in our everyday lives. To be aware of these sounds without any sort of judgment could be one of the easiest ways to meditate.

Sound awareness exercise can be done at any point of time and at any place, one can practice this technique to get a quick relief from stress and anxiety and to calm the mind.

Exercise
. Sit comfortably and take a few inhalations and exhalations.
. Close your eyes and focus on the incoming and outgoing breath.
. Slowly shift your attention to the sounds around you. Donâ€™t let the mind hunt for sounds. Relax and listen intentionally to the sounds around you.
. Focus only on the sounds and not on thoughts and emotions. 
----
It was created by combining different animated images.
80 frames one by one painting technique was applied.
